column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Lidia - Thank you for your great review. I'm glad you enjoyed your stay with us
column2: and we thank you for understanding our situation. With hindsight being 20/20
column3: four years ago we would have built a location twice as big had we thought demand for ramen in Houston would be so high. Nevertheless
column4: we are thankful to folks like yourself for dining with us. Thank you again
column5: and we hope to serve you in the near future.
